msg: HBASE-10635 thrift#TestThriftServer fails due to TTL validity check

author: rhbutani
msg: HIVE-6393 Support unqualified column references in Joining conditions (Harish Butani via Gunther Hagleitner)

author: brett
msg: The maven-project API in 2.x did some magic to populate the artifacts,
such as setting up files for system dependencies. To ensure those all
continue to work, use the existing Maven 2.x API to populate the artifacts
rather than creating them by hand.
